name: Beef & Broccoli Stir Fry
description: Flank steak strips, wok-fried in soy sauce, served with broccoli and mushrooms

name: Grilled Chicken & Butter Beans
description: Grilled chicken with southern style lima beans, smoked ham, seasoned and served in a bed of white rice

name: Grilled Salmon with Rice & Veggies
description: Grilled salmon served with basmati rice, veggies, and a blend of seasoning

name: Chickpea Meatloaf
description: Our take on meatloaf, made with chickpeas, rice, spinach, mushrooms, seasoned with thyme and paprika, and served with onion gravy

name: Mediterranean Turkey Meatballs with Orzo & Roasted Veggies
description: Turkey meatballs served with orzo, roasted veggies, and a blend of herbs

name: Chicken Pesto Pasta
description: penne pasta tossed in fragrant basil pesto sauce with juicy grilled chicken

name: Peanut Noodles with Tofu
description: Vietnamese rice noodles tossed in our house made peanut sauce, with a hint of lime and spice

name: Burrito Bowl
description: Drawing on our texan roots, prepared with seasoned ground beef, our house made sofrito, rice, topped with avocado crema, veggies, and green olives

name: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Quesadilla
description: A house favorite, prepared with black beans, sofrito, sweet potato, garlic, cheddar cheese, and topped with salsa verde

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Prepared with seasoned ground beef and Italian pork sausage, served with vegetables in a house made marinara sauce

name: French Toast
description: Golden-brown bread, soaked in a mixture of egg, milk, and cinnamon, served hot with maple syrup

name: Mashed Banana Overnight Oats
description: Old fashioned oats, fresh mashed bananas, oats, milk, walnuts, honey, chia seeds, cinnamon, and dates

name: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
description: Buttermilk pancakes infused with chocolate chips, topped with maple syrup
